name: Son Doong Riverside
address: Ha Loi Village, Son Trach Commune, Bo Trach District, Quang Binh Province, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Son Doong Riverside cung cấp quầy bar và nằm ở Phong Nha. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như nhà hàng, bếp chung và phòng chờ chung, cùng với Wi-Fi miễn phí. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tất cả các căn có điều hòa tại khách sạn đều được trang bị tủ lạnh, máy pha cà phê, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, đầu đĩa Blu-ray và thiết bị chơi game. Các phòng đều có ấm đun nước và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen và máy sấy tóc, trong đó một số phòng có bếp được trang bị bếp. Tại Son Doong Riverside, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Khách có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa tại chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn này có dịch vụ thuê xe đạp và dịch vụ thuê ô tô. Ngoài ra, đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực.

Thành thạo tiếng Anh, tiếng Pháp, tiếng Ý và tiếng Ba Lan, đội ngũ nhân viên tại lễ tân 24/24 luôn túc trực để hỗ trợ khách.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách chỗ nghỉ 39 km.

review.comment_positive: It was quite cheap
review.comment_negative: The water from the tap smelled foul. The water from the shower came from one of them shower head that sprays a mist rather than a stream of water, it took 3 to 4 times longer to rinse the soap off. The first day for breakfast I had an omelette which was ok, but the didn’t have any tea. My wife had pork noodles, when I pointed to the noodles on the menu I could see the girl wasn’t happy. The second day I had omelette again (ok). But when I asked for pork noodles again I was told there was no pork (I had the impression she just didn’t want to cook them (I could be wrong, but that’s the feeling I got). I rented a scooter for the afternoon. No front brakes, back breaks half working, no tread on tyres and lights didn’t work. Also the view advertised on booking.com was a composite (I thought it didn’t look right when I first looked. I was right.

The hosts are also rude and non-accommodating.

review.rating: Perfect stay with the most amazing owners :)
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: If I could, I would rate this higher. The rooms were beautiful, spacious and comfortable, we also had a heater as it got cold at night. The home stay owners were beyond helpful to me and my friends, helping us to get to Phong Nha from Cat Ba which was the worst journey we’ve experienced. The home stay owners were so helpful and made sure we arrived ok in the middle of the night. The owners were so lovely, and couldn’t do more for us. The home stay is situated next to a beautiful river on a street with nice restaurants and very close to Phong Nha cave and the restaurants in town. The owners even cooked us breakfast even though we had to leave at 4am, which we were so grateful for. Perfect stay, thank you again Son Doong Riverside, would fully recommend!

review.comment_positive: Nos vinieron a buscar amablemente a la parada del Bus sin coste extra. Muy agradables!
review.comment_negative:
Las fotos eran un montaje de Photoshop. Lo reservamos por la buena nota en Booking y nos desilusionamos al ver lo cutre que era al llegar. Muy diferente a las fotos. 

Por desgracia, salió una pequeña cucaracha de la cama nada más llegar, lo que no nos transmitió mucha confianza desde el principio.

Nada más llegar, después de intercambiar 2 frases, nos empezaron a preguntar por nuestros planes en la zona para vendernos todo tipo de tours y bus disponibles. No fue muy cómoda la llegada y creo que deberían ser más discretos con los huéspedes. 

Creo que es un hostal normalito pero no para fiarse de la nota de +9 que tiene en booking

review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist sehr gut, direkt am Fluss. Die Besitzer sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit und bieten gute Ausflüge an. review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive:
I have the greatest of impressions staying in Son Doong Riverside while visiting Phong Nha.
You should expect the sweetest of the owners and staff you would meet in your trip to Vietnam.
A smiling lady picked me up from the bus station at 04,00 am and offered me a roo. to rest after a long night bus route.
Their location is right by the river, in a walking distance from the town center, and their breakfast is the best i had in Vietnam.
Room is absolutely clean and quiet and provides anything you may need.
Of course the main thing is the kindness and support you get from the people who run the Homestay.
Highly recommended!!!

review.comment_positive:

Bookings for tours to caves and bus transfers are also possible at the homestay, here too everything worked out flawlessly. Laundry can also be done at the homestay and was always returned within a very short time. 
The breakfast is very tasty and can even be chosen à la carte. The rooms are spacious and very clean. The street is busy during the day, but quiet in the evening, so we could sleep well.

review.comment_positive: It is pretty much run by the 17 year old son who speaks some English. Mum cooks a great meal (limited menu & only if you ask) and dad is friendly enough (neither speak English). They dropped me off for a Cave tour 50 minutes early which was frustrating. I was happy to have Netflix on my TV and I was pleased with the pick up / drop off for the bus and cave Tour, but that’s about it.
review.comment_negative:
I have mixed feelings about this property. For a Homestay I felt I had to do a lot of asking for things and just didn’t feel overly welcome. My Deluxe River view DID NOT have a river view, DID NOT get serviced (no fresh towels, toilet paper, water or bed made). I was charged for a bottle of water when I only received 2 bottles for a paid 3 night stay.  Cheeky.

I think their listing needs updating… Casino? Room service? Bar? Fitness Centre? Not that I needed this but No!

I rode into town (charged for bicycle) & got drenched, couldn’t really find anything open or anywhere to buy supplies (for my bus trip). I guess I was a little let down overall with my experience and surprised at the reviews.

review.rating: This family-run accommodation across the river from the main town offers great views, excellent owner hospitality, and a
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
This charming establishment sits just across the road from the river, away from the hustle and bustle of the main town, offering guests breathtaking views throughout their stay. The owner's hospitality truly stood out during our visit. Observing us walking back from town, he kindly offered us a lift back to the accommodation. He went above and beyond by arranging a fantastic sleeper bus for our next journey and even personally drove us to the bus stop. Additionally, when I found a cheaper tour online, he graciously matched the price, ensuring we enjoyed a delightful tour.

Operated by a warm and welcoming family, the place exudes a cozy ambiance. Breakfast, though simple, was satisfying, allowing us to savor the beautiful surroundings while starting our day. It's important to note that there are no elevators on the premises, but the stunning views from the rooms more than make up for any inconvenience. All in all, this accommodation offers a delightful retreat with incredible views and outstanding hospitality.

review.rating: Amazing stay in the center of Phong Nha
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
We had a great stay at Son Doong Riverside. The room was very clean, spacious and well-equipped. There are around 10 different breakfast options and the food is very good.
The family that runs the hotel was extremely kind and caring. We arrived to Phong Nha at 5am and the family picked us up from the bus for free. We were able to check into our room immediately (i.e. very early check-in) and get some rest after the bus ride. We rented a scooter from the homestay and got a flat tire on the way to the caves. Within 15min they were there with a replacement scooter and also moved the full thank of petrol which we had just filled up to the new scooter. On our departure, which was a really hot day, they gave us a fresh bottle of cold water for free for our way.

review.comment_positive: Sehr nettes Personal, schöner Balkon um noch spät draußen zu sitzen. Das Bett war sehe gut  und auch das Gemälde darüber wunderschön und hat eine Höhle gezeigt. Die richtige Stimmung für eben eine solche Besichtigung am kommenden Tag. Das Zimmer war geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Der Blick auf den Fluss.. einfach traumhaft.
review.comment_negative: Ich brauchte den Kühlschrank nicht bei einer Nacht und war froh drum. Da befand sich der Überrest einer Art Schote verschimmelt. Und um 4:49 brummte und summte es so laut, daß man wach wurde. Irgendein Hotel System von draußen. Nach einer halben Stunde stoppte das sehr penetrante Geräusch. Aber ärgerlich war, dass ich bar bezahlen musste, weil mit Visa spontan ein Aufschlag verlangt wurde. Wenn das in Vietnams Geschäften klappt mit Karte zu zahlen, sollte das auch in Hotels so sein.ohne Aufschlag. Bei Buchung stand ich könne problemlos bei Anreise zahlen. Eigentlich ein Vorteil.  Aber nur wenn man vorsichtshalber für einen 4 Tages Trip in die Region genug Bar Geld eingepackt hat.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Красивый вид из номера – мы брали с видом на реку, но по факту были видны и горы и закат вечером. В номере были чайник, фен, небольшой холодильник и каждый день нам меняли полотенца и приносили воду.

Персонал очень приятный – нас встретили и организовали бесплатный трансфер до отеля, а также увезли на станцию, откуда мы уезжали ночным автобусом. Вручили воду, печенья и 2 вкуснейших Banh Mi – поэтому с утра у нас был готовый завтрак! :)
Также, мы брали 2 однодневные экскурсии напрямую у отеля, которые были просто невероятными! Спасибо за рекомендации
Завтраки нам очень понравились!
review.comment_negative:
Доступны бесплатные велосипеды, но их пару штук и они не в самом лучшем состоянии, далеко уехать на них не получится. Мы ездили только до центра, чтобы добраться до кафе
Также, были проблемы с душем. Тяжело отрегулировать нужную температуру, сама сантехника была потрепанной и не было никаких ограждений/штор, поэтому вся ванная комната после принятия душа в воде

review.comment_positive: This was an amazing place to stay. The location was perfect. Situated on the outskirts of the town on the riverside, it is perfect for visits to the all the local caves! The hosts were so informative and friendly, we were immediately made to feel at home and were offered pick up from the bus and drop off when we were leaving! The hotel itself was great value for money and had spacious rooms with a great view. The breakfast, especially the banana pancakes were perfect! Despite checking out earlier in the day, we were still able to hire a motorbike and leave our bags at the hotel all day, when we returned, we were given water and Oreos for our bus journey onwards! Amazing! Can’t recommend this place enough!

Mình có đặt cơm ở đây với cá suối chiên rất ngon.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
The hosts were the kindest people!! I arrived in Don't Hoi, from Da Nang, on the Reunification Express. The hosts provided me with cab service (paid extra for it, then) - picked us up from the station (and later dropped us off). I arrived at Phong Nha, without any plans. The hosts provided us with guided tours to Phong Nha and Paradise Caves (they also offer activities at Dark Cave, for a higher price). 
The breakfast is delicious! If you like Indian Chinese cuisine, then I recommend their egg fried rice. Rooms, toilet, beds, are clean. The hosts provide you with bicycles for free, in the evenings - in case you would want to go around for food.

review.rating: Son Doong Riverside checked all the boxes - clean, friendly, well located, comfortable, helpful.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Very pleased with our stay at the Son Doong Riverside. The place was immaculately clean, in both the rooms and common areas. They have a fantastic breakfast area on the riverside. Banana pancakes were great. They were very helpful at arranging tours (although it seemed that all the places used the same tour group). We saw Paradise, Phong Nha Cave and the Botanical Gardens in one day. They arranged airport taxis for us. Perhaps a km or so walk to town. People that we spoke with from other homestays didn't seem to be as happy with their choice as we were with the Son Doong. I would strongly recommend this place to any friend or family member planning to visit Phong Nha. They work hard to provide a great guest experience and it shows.
review.comment_negative: Really can't think of anything to complain about.

review.rating: Clean and comfortable homestay in Phong Nha
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive:
We actually just booked this stay as a basic rest stop after our Hang En cave adventure with Oxalis and before we caught the bus to Hoi An. We expected very basic facilities but were pleasantly surprised. The room and bathroom were spacious, everything was clean, the bathroom had nice toiletries and hot water. The people running the homestay are extremely
gracious and friendly- they gave us water and bananas as a snack for our bus ride, and peanuts while we waited for the bus. They helped us book bus tickets and the pick up was right outside the homestay. They also allowed us to take bicycles for free to grab dinner outside. Overall a comfortable stay with lovely people.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really, everything was fine. A super minor issue would be that the door to the room didn’t shut properly unless you locked it.

They don't desserve a +9 grade.
It has been the less good accommodation in our trip. I would recommend trying another well graded place and here is why:
The description of the room is false and overly ambitious: certainly no spa bath, or bath tub, or fireplace, and I would swear room size is significantly smaller than the 24m2 stated. 
Not that you probably need those services, but they certainly paint a very misleading picture.
Another example is that they also state several times on their website that they have a fitness center: they have 3 pieces of equipment you wouldn't ever be able to use in the lobby.

review.comment_positive:
Everything was perfect. I’m convinced this is the best family in all of Vietnam. Catered to all our needs and invited us to a family party which was perfect. Providing us with lots and lots of happy juice on the house! Vietnamese people are lovely anyway but this family definitely tops it! couldn’t recommend this enough and if we’re ever in phong nha again I will not hesitate to stay here. I hope to see them again.

Lots of love Kyle and Lottie.

review.comment_positive:
really lovely home stay, the family are amazing and so helpful. nothing is too much trouble; they let us use their shower after we’d checked out as we did the caves on our only day here! we only spent a night but can imagine if staying longer it feels like home. 
location is on the quieter side which we liked, more local vibes. 
free pick up from where our bus dropped us off which was a great help and good advice on our onward travel / tours available. 
food tasty & affordable and a good breakfast included in the price of the room which is a nice touch.
review.comment_negative: the room was a little damp, which didn’t bother us as it was late and just for one night. it rains a lot in the area so from people we spoke to, it was the same in other guest houses/home stays.

review.rating: Homely feel, caring staff and stunning views.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
The location. Simply spectacular. What a view to wake up to in the morning. The staff were helpful, polite and some spoke good English. We rented a scooter for 2 days which was easy and they booked our bus to Hanoi for us which saved us a lot of hassle.

The room is fairly basic, ours felt slightly damp but this may not be the case for all. The Wi-Fi isn’t great but I suppose that’s expected with the location. Hot water seemed like a luxury but again, it’s expected?

Breakfast was easy and quick, a nice addition but we usually went on to get a snack before lunch - maybe we’re just greedy! 

Overall a pleasant experience and certainly worth it for the view.
review.comment_negative: It is slightly out of town, not really walkable. Most food around the hotel closes by 10pm. We arrived late after a long sleeper bus and we’re left hungry before bed. Not the hotels fault at all, but something to consider if you want easily accessible restaurants and bars.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Desde el primer momento la atención fue excelente, nos recogieron en el pueblo al llegar por la madrugada y nos llevaron a casa. A la mañana siguiente el desayuno era agradable.

Las habitaciones son bastante amplias, con ventana grande. Todo el lugar era muy higiénico y el personal muy muy amable.
Tienes la facilidad de rentar una motocicleta en el lugar y también tienen bicicletas para moverte.

Un lugar excelente para conocer phong nha, totalmente recomendado.

review.comment_positive:
Small hotel kept by a friendly family.
The rooms were nice and clean with hot showers.
They organized us a taxi to pick us up from the train station, they booked us a nice big bus to Hue and dropped us for free at the bus stop. They also organize trips to the caves. We went with them to Paradise cave and it was actually the husband who drove us in his confortable car.
review.comment_negative:
One room had a problem with the lock so we had to switch to another room, which was not a big inconvenience as we noticed it from the start and we got a nicer room (the first one had no window).
It was cold and rainy outside, so the rooms felt cold and damp too. The drying system of the airco helped a bit, but it would have been nice to have a heater in the room (the airco only dried or cooled).

They arranged a tour for us for the same day to the paradise cave and the dark cave which was fun! (the botanical gardens and rescue center that comes with the tour is not really worth your time, but it is a package deal.) They also booked us a bus to Hue, which picked us up at the hotel. So we where very happy with this homestay because they made our trip to Phong Nha very easy and relaxing!

review.comment_positive: Really nice staff here. Like 10 stars for them. Rooms were clean and comfy, breakfest was delicious. They helped us arrange the trip into the caves. Picked up us on the bus stop for free. We could take a shower before get on the sleeper bus.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: Sehr zuvorkommende nette Familie! Sie hat uns ohne Aufpreis vom um 4 Uhr morgens von der Bussation abgeholt und am nächsten Tag auch dort wieder abgesetzt. Wir konnten auch schon um 4 Uhr morgens einchecken und haben nach der Nacht im Nachtbus noch einbisschen Schlafen können, bevor der Tag losging. Frühstück haben wir auch bekommen. Die Dame dort ist sehr herzlich: Als wir abends etwas essen wollten, hat sie und spontan Reis und Frühlingsrollen gemacht ( für einen kleinen Preis). Wir haben und dort sehr wohl gefühlt und können das Hotel nur weiterempfehlen!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
lovely host, nice rooms and good food :)

super helpful arranging cave tours!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: La atención es lo mejor del lugar. Te hace sentir como en casa. Ella es tan amable y te contagia una sonrisa siempre. El hotel es muy lindo, limpio, bien ubicado. Son muy atentos y amables. Nos dejaron quedarnos en el hotel después de la excursión hasta las 21 que teníamos bus ofreciendo ducha, toalla, etc. Excelente atención. También con ella conseguimos la excursión del día por phong nha. El bus para ninh binh. Y nos dio agua y galletitas antes de llevarnos al bus. Fuimos muy felices. Lo recomendamos al 100%. Gracias Son Doong Riverside!!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: L'emplacement au bord de la rivière
review.comment_negative:
Le personnel present uniquement pour nous vendre des tours organisés. 
Nous avons loué un scooter (comme a chaque fois que nous sommes dans une homestay), en panne au bout de 20min sur du plat.  Ils nous en   ont ramené un autre pour que nous puissions continuer notre balade, il a marché 15min le temps d'aller au botanic garden puis le pot d'échappement à commencer à faire des bruit de pétards avant de caler et de ne plus redémarrer. Aucun geste commercial de leur part et de vagues excuses en sous entendant que les étrangers ne savent pas conduire des scooters...
Bon rapport qualité prix malgré tout parce que très peu cher mais ne louez pas de scooters chez eux.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliches Personal. Der Trip in die Höhlen konnte von dort aus organisiert werden. Die Unterkunft lag sehr schön am Fluss, gut fussläufig vom Ort zu erreichen. Das Frühstück war ausreichend und gut. Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Blick auf den Fluss- sowie einen gemeinsam Balkon, auf dem man einen wunderbaren Blick hatte. In ca. 10-15min Entfernung- ortsauswärts - gibt es ein wunderbar leckeres veganes Restaurant. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Hier lohnt es sich wirklich einen Tag länger zu bleiben und die Gegend mit dem Roller oder Fahrrad zu erkunden.
review.comment_negative:
Das Bad hat leider keine getrennte Dusche, sodass, wie so oft, beim duschen alles unter Wasser steht. 
Bei der Weiterreise wurde dem Busfahrer ein falscher Ausstieg genannt, obwohl bis zu finalen Station gezahlt wurde.  Das waren dann extra Kosten für uns. Daher aufpassen, wo man rausgelassen wird.

This is a great location for an extended stay or for just a quick stop-over during your visit as you enjoy the numerous beautiful sights  and activities.

review.rating: Great place to stay in Phong Nha 🙂
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: From the moment we booked, service was great, we received information and support to all questions we had for planning our trip to this location. We took the night bus from Hanoi and arrived to Phong Nha at 04:00 in the morning, we were told by Son Doong Riverside to call as soon as we got there and they would pick us up by car, they did so on time and free of charge. The ladies on the reception are very nice and polite, and specially very proactive for providing information and helping with any question. They helped us book our tours in Phong Nha as well as to book our bus to travel next days to Hué - bus picked us up from the door of the hotel. The room itself was great, the size is good with much space, big windows and well equiped. Room and bathroom very clean and tidy. The breakfast is very good, we were asked to choose the options for meal and beverages from the menu, we liked it very much. When leaving we were provided with some snacks and water for our bus trip for free, which felt like a nice gesture. We felt very comfortable, the hotel itself as well as the atmosphere is very nice and caring. We would definitely come back and totally recommend it. Many thanks for the service.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: Conseils touristiques, prêt de vélo, gentillesse du personnel, la vue !!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
האירוח היה מושלם ומותאם לצרכים שלנו.
המשפחה מקסימה אירחה אותנו בחיוך ובסבלנות להבין את השפה(אנגלית).
הגענו ב7:00 בבקר אחרי נסיעה ארוכה ברכבת..דאגו לנו לארוחת בקר ולחדרים הרבה לפני הצק אין.
נעזרנו בהסעות שלהם לאתרים 
הארוחות היו טעימות.
בסהכ נהנו מאוד

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff. Great breakfast. Lovely location with river view and near Phong Nha cave. WiFi worked well. Good value for money. Fridge and kettle in room.
review.comment_negative: The room lacked some touches to make guests comfortable - no bedside lamp, no tea & coffee, no teaspoons, and only two pillows and two towels provided...a bathroom mat and hand towel would have been nice. The fridge needed a clean. On Booking.com it stated there was a fitness centre and there simply is not!

review.rating: Simply Awesome. Will go back next year.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Very nice people. Made us feels special with their personalized attention. Special mention to The owner couple Hop and Hoi , Sang and Ms Hue. Food provided was excellent.  The River Side view was awesome. We had booked the river view rooms which were of good size , very neat and clean. One can hire bike at the Homestay . Value for money. The Homestay made travel arrangements  at very reasonable cost. They  provide all the information with regards to places of interest in the area. Minimum days recommended 3-4 days  or more to really  enjoy and absorb the beauty of the place and visit all the places in the area.
Would definitely like to go back.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Le personnel est super gentil, ils proposent des tours et des locations de scooter.
Elle est même venue nous chercher à 4h du matin après notre bus. Le petit déjeuner est très bon et la chambre plutôt spacieuse.
review.comment_negative: Un petite odeur d'humidité dans la chambre.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The staff were incredible! Very sweet and went out of their way to help me. The location was beautiful and the room was clean and comfy with an excellent view and a great value.
review.comment_negative: Not much I didn't like...maybe all the ants near the bathroom sometimes. It didn't bother me though to be honest because it happens in that area! They went away on their own very quickly.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel with a nice view. Big room and clean walking distance to the town center. Picked us up at 2am from the bus station for free. Scooter hire at 150k and bicycle hire for 70k.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We arrived late in the evening and they arranged to have us picked up from the train station. As well as that, they cooked us dinner when we arrived. We booked a tour to the caves and national park for the next day which they ran themselves. It was a small group and an incredible experience. When we arrived home from the tour we had already checked out so they let us use their personal shower and gave us a lift back into town to get our bus. Cannot recommended this homestay enough, they were beautiful people and we will definitely return next time we’re in Phong Nha.
review.comment_negative: Nothing!

review.rating: Best ,clean and affordable stay in Phong na
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive:
Stay was clean 
Food was great 
Owner is super helpful..came at 4am to pick us from the bus stop..
They also have bikes ( cycles) and you can use them free of cost..
They offer cheap motorbike rents too..
They have a table near by lake and it looks beautiful 
Can recommend this  stay!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Clean and comfortable room with a nice view and friendly staff
review.comment_negative: About a 20min walk to the main part of Phong Nha but there are some restaurants beside the hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The view from the room is really good. All facilities are available, such as tour booking, laundry, restaurant ,bus booking, scooter, cycle etc. If you book bus with them , they offer pick up and drop service. Very helpful staff.
review.comment_negative: Our room was on the 2nd floor, lift was not available.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Konnten nachts einchecken und in einem Übergangszimmer schlafen.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
- clean & spacious room 
- staff were lovely, we booked the dark/ paradise cave tour through them & it was amazing! 
- can hire bicycles 
- breakfast was simple but lovely 
- cheap! 
- our bus arrived from Nimh Bin at 4am, they picked us up and let us check in straight away so we could sleep which was lovely
review.comment_negative:
lunch options weren’t that great- don’t try the pumpkin soup! 
location was a bicycle ride/ walk to where all the restaurants are but we didn’t mind :)

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Family owned business and all we're very happy and helpful.
Husband, limited English, but wife was a little better. Son spoke good English 

We arrived by bus at 3 30an, and she came and picked us up, and we checked in immediately and went to bed.

We did arrange for a cave tour the next day before back to sleep.

Room was very comfortable.
The property was across the road from the river, so a nice outlook.

They allowed us to use 2 bicycles for a couple of days at no charge 

Breakfast was included...choice of about 6-7 dishes + various drinks inclusive.

Only issue was not many restaurants nearby for evening meal..  But on our last night the staff cooked for us.  Which was nice.

We were dropped off to the bus in the morning we left

No charge for either pickup or drop off 

Enjoyed it and highly recommend the stay.

Paradise Cave was amazing!!!!!
review.comment_negative:
Only the lack of nearby eating places .
But that not their fault.

review.rating: Super herzliche Gastgeber und sehr schöne Unterkunft
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Die Herzlichkeit der Gastgeberfamilie ist besonders hervorzuheben! Sie kümmern sich wirklich um alles und das auch super kurzfristig (Tourenplanung & Transfer). Wir sind abends mit dem Bus in Phong Nha angekommen und nach kurzer Kontaktaufnahme mit der Unterkunft wurden wir direkt und kostenlos vom Bus abgeholt. Außerdem konnten wir für unsere zweitägige Höhlentour die größeren Rucksäcke in der Unterkunft lassen und bequem um eine Nacht verlängern, sodass wir nach unserer Tour direkt wieder ein Zimmer hatten. 
Die Unterkunft ist außerdem sehr schön in Flussnähe gelegen, sehr sauber und sehr komfortabel! Die mit Abstand bisher beste Unterkunft während unserer Vietnamreise.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: This hôtel had everything we looked for : perfect location, nice room with TV, motorbikes rental, delicious breakfast and very kind people (they picked us up at the bus station, gave good advice, and allowed us to stay at the hotel and shower after check out). I recommend!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: O atendimento e o café da manhã são bons e eles oferecem serviço de busca e transferência ao ponto de ônibus de graça - o que é muito bom pois lá não há taxi fácil nem ônibus na cidade
review.comment_negative:
o quarto tinha um cheiro muito forte de mofo, percebemos o mesmo nos demais quartos do andar em que nos hospedamos.
o banheiro é muito pequeno e sem box, o que deixava tudo molhado quando se toma banho
a limpeza poderia ser melhor - poeira no quarto

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm

review.rating: Amazing hosts that go above and beyond
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The hosts are beyond fantastic. We only booked for one night at approx £8, but they picked us up from the sleeper bus at 4.30am for free and took us to the hotel. They then let us check in early at that time even though our booking wasn't until the next night, again for free. They also helped with booking a bus to Hue. There's also a really nice range of options for included breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Muy buena ubicación, todo el personal fue muy amable y simpático. Les pedimos que si podíamos tener una habitación con vistas al rio y nos cambiaron a una estupenda. El desayuno estaba muy rico y tenían bastante variedad para elegir. Nos ofrecieron gratis bicis y motos para movernos por la zona.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The staff were really friendly, nice hotel with a great view and good location. The family picked us up from the bus station and dropped us off, free of charge. Also great breakfast/dinner
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Great family, great breakfast, and great room!
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive:
The family that runs it is so lovely, they can’t do enough to help you! They offered to pick us up from the bus station, booked our tours, organised our onward journey and dropped us off at the bus station too free of charge. 
The room was great, shampoo etc all provided. 
Breakfast had a variety of options, and portions were a great size (the pancakes and banana smoothie were our faves)
We would stay here again!
review.comment_negative: The house is about a 15 minute walk from the main area of restaurants but we liked the walk (also meant we had a nice view of the river instead of buildings) and you can rent bikes or mopeds if needed!

review.rating: lovely staff, super helpful with everything and tours even car lifts, great english, free breakfast, and amazing views o
review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Có Phòng Tắm
review.comment_positive: lovely staff, super helpful with everything and tours even car lifts, great english, free breakfast, and amazing views of mountains, would definitely recommend! 5-10 min walk to centre of town however only downside is you will be woken up by roosters at 4-6am lol

review.rating: Homestay siêu sạch sẽ, view đẹp, chủ nhà thân thiện.
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Homestay siêu sạch sẽ, thơm tho, view ra núi hoặc sông Côn siêu lãng mạn. Phía trước khách sạn có khu ghế ngồi ngắm sông thư giãn. Giá phòng rất hợp lý và bao gồm ăn sáng. Anh chị chủ nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Ngày mình check out anh chủ còn tặng thêm 2 chai nước suối để đi đường xa và còn kiểm tra lốp xe giúp tụi mình nữa. 10 điểm!

review.rating: Comfortable stay for a couple nights.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Breakfast was really nice the banana pancakes were great. You order from a menu which has traditional foods and then pancakes so we opted for banana pancakes each day and loved them. You also get to choose a drink too which we had tea & milk. 

Location was great, there is a couple restaurants down the road which are really good if you walk left from the homestay. 

Quiet location no noise in the evenings. 

Rented a scooter directly from the homestay. 

Staff are so friendly, provided us with water for our onwards journey. 

Room has a fridge and provided with water which was great.
review.comment_negative:
Our toilet bin wasn’t emptied for 3 days when the room was cleaned. Our towels were changed but not the bin which isn’t very nice. 

My pillow case had stains all over it, as if it hasn’t been washed as i picked one bit of dirt off. When we went downstairs there was no one there to change it luckily i had my own pillow case in my bag to swap it with, but i’m sure if there was someone they would’ve swapped it immediately. 

The sheet had black stains over it as well and hairs stuck to the bedroom walls. 

Whenever we went downstairs there was never anyone there, their son took our breakfast order each morning but we don’t think he was working as he was on the sofa playing games on his phone so maybe having someone a bit more present would be great.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng ngon. Nhân viên thân thiện. Chủ nhà thân thiện, support rất nhiều.
review.comment_negative: Mùi của nhà vệ sinh cần được cải thiện hơn

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông

review.comment_positive: Lovely location and really friendly hosts. Able to rent a bike from them easily too. Lots of choice for breakfast, would recommend :)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: We werden s’ochtends vroeg (4:30 uur) opgehaald en konden direct al inchecken terwijl we pas voor de dag erna gereserveerd hadden, heerlijk ontbijt en aardige mensen. Top dus!

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: It has all the necessary stuff plus the owners are very friendly. He lent me a kayak for free!
review.comment_negative: none. for this price, I got way more than expected

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Sehr hilfsbereites und liebenswürdiges Personal.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The property had good views of the river. The room was clean and everything worked. The rooms were decorated tastefully. Breakfast was standard but the coffee was good. Really nice vegan restaurant about 500m up river!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
사장님과 직원들이 아주 친절하고 원하는것에 잘 대응해줬다 
가성비에 최고인것같은 숙소

review.comment_negative: 사장님의 웃음으로 개선점은 없어진다

review.comment_negative: Problème de scoot, on est tombé en panne plusieurs fois ce qui nous a gâché une journée. Nous avons quand même payé la location du scooter pour cette journée... Heureusement ils nous l'ont changé.

Un chauffeur est venu nous chercher tard le soir à notre arrivée et à notre départ nous avons été amenés par deux motos à notre arrêt de bus. C'était très appréciable et en plus c'était gratuit !

Locatie beetje uit het centrum. 15 min lopen of met de fiets die je daar kan huren of motorbike is dat geen probleem.!

Spotlessly clean and great staff. View from
the room was overlooking the mountains.
review.comment_negative: Nothing at all to pick fault with.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Good location with bike rental available, lady picked us up at 3am in the morning to drive us to the homestay and we were able to check in early which was great after a night travelling. Nice riverside location and only 5 min drive into town. Also helped us book our next bus to Da Nang.
